verses.verse: Now the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H573>Amittai,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H5210>Nineveh,<s%> that <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H7121>cry<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it; for their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> is <S%H5927>come<s%> up <S%H6440>before<s%> me.

But <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up to <S%H1272>flee<s%> to <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3305>Joppa;<s%> and he <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H591>ship<s%> <S%H935>going<s%> to <S%H8659>Tarshish:<s%> so he <S%H5414>paid<s%> the <S%H7939>fare<s%> thereof, and <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into it, to <S%H935>go<s%> with them to <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2904>sent<s%> out a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and there was a <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H5591>tempest<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> so that the <S%H591>ship<s%> was <S%H2803>like<s%> to be <S%H7665>broken.<s%>

Then the <S%H4419>mariners<s%> were <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> and <S%H2199>cried<s%> every man to his <S%H430>god,<s%> and <S%H2904>cast<s%> <S%H2904>forth<s%> the <S%H3627>wares<s%> that were in the <S%H591>ship<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> to <S%H7043>lighten<s%> it of them. But <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> was <S%H3381>gone<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H5600>ship;<s%> and he <S%H7901>lay,<s%> and was fast <S%H7290>asleep.<s%>

So the <S%H7227>shipmaster<s%> <S%H2259><s%> <S%H7126>came<s%> to him, and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>What<s%> mean you, O <S%H7290>sleeper?<s%> <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> on your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H194>if<s%> so be that <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6245>think<s%> on us, that we <S%H6>perish<s%> not.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H7453>fellow,<s%> <S%H3212>Come,<s%> and let us <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots,<s%> that we may <S%H3045>know<s%> for <S%H4310>whose<s%> <S%H7945>cause<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> is on us. So they <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots,<s%> and the <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on <S%H3124>Jonah.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> they to him, <S%H5046>Tell<s%> us, we <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, for <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H4310><s%> <S%H834>cause<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> is on us; <S%H4100>What<s%> is your <S%H4399>occupation?<s%> and from <S%H370>where<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> you? <S%H4100>what<s%> is your <S%H776>country?<s%> and of <S%H335>what<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> are you?

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, I am an <S%H5680>Hebrew;<s%> and I <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> and the <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H127>land.<s%>

Then were the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H1419>exceedingly<s%> <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him. <S%H4100>Why<s%> have you <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2063>this?<s%> For the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that he <S%H1272>fled<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he had <S%H5046>told<s%> them.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> they to him, <S%H4100>What<s%> shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> to you, that the <S%H3220>sea<s%> may be <S%H8367>calm<s%> to us? for the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H1980>worked,<s%> and was <S%H5492>tempestuous.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H5375>Take<s%> me up, and <S%H2904>cast<s%> me <S%H2904>forth<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> so shall the <S%H3220>sea<s%> be <S%H8367>calm<s%> to you: for I <S%H3045>know<s%> that for my <S%H7945>sake<s%> this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5591>tempest<s%> is on you.

Nevertheless the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H2864>rowed<s%> hard to <S%H7725>bring<s%> it to the <S%H3004>land;<s%> but they <S%H3201>could<s%> not: for the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H1980>worked,<s%> and was <S%H5492>tempestuous<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them.
Why they cried to the LORD, and said, We beseech you, O LORD, we beseech you, let us not perish for this man's life, and lay not on us innocent blood: for you, O LORD, have done as it pleased you.

So they <S%H5375>took<s%> up <S%H3124>Jonah,<s%> and <S%H2904>cast<s%> him <S%H2904>forth<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H3220>sea:<s%> and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H5975>ceased<s%> from her <S%H2197>raging.<s%>
Then the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1419>exceedingly,<s%> and <S%H2076>offered<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and made <S%H5088>vows.<s%>

Now the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H4487>prepared<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1709>fish<s%> to <S%H1104>swallow<s%> up <S%H3124>Jonah.<s%> And <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> was in the <S%H4578>belly<s%> of the <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3915>nights.<s%>
